title: Enhancing Learning Design Practical Skills: AR/VR Wearable-Based English Immersive Teaching Method Design

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary English education experience and basic digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Instructional designs can be implemented that improve the 'confidence' and 'relevance' components of learner motivation (ARCS model) by 80% or more using AR/VR wearable devices
A project-based assessment tool can be developed to evaluate language functions (speaking/listening/reading) in a mixed-reality simulation environment
An operational manual for large-scale AR/VR English classes in a BYOD environment can be produced
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
